programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series Red heads south to Florida for Round 8. Bakugan Dragonoid’s Camden Murphy has the series points lead and tries to keep Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson from continuing his climb back to the top in Tampa. While Megalodon’s Todd LeDuc attempts to win his second straight Overall Event Championship.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: On February 22, 2020 at Marlin's Park, see all the racing and freestyle action from Monster Jam's 2020 season!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series Blue kicks-off the 2023 Monster Jam Season in San Diego’s SnapDragon Stadium. Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga attempts to win his 3rd consecutive event in San Diego, California while Son-Uva Digger’s Ryan Anderson begins defense of series championship.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: MetLife Stadium - East Rutherford, NJ - Freestyle
programme.desc: Check out all the freestyle Monster Jam action from MetLife Stadium on June 13, 2015 with 20 Trucks!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam rolls into Angel Stadium in Anaheim, CA for a weekend of exciting racing action from all your favorite trucks and drivers!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Check out all of the racing action from all three shows at the Gelredome, on September 26–27, 2009.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Don't miss all the racing action from the final event at the HHH Metrodome on December 7, 2013.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Buckle in for all the epic racing and freestyle action from Raymond James Stadium, on February 5, 2011.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Freestyle action from a jam-packed Ford Field stadium in Detroit, MI, on January 20, 2007.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: It's week 2 from the Citrus Bowl in Orlando, FL- it's about to get rowdy with Monster Jam's exciting freestyle competitions!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: The fans are on fire for Monster Jam freestyle action from Montreal's Olympic Stadium, on October 29, 2005.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam heads to the racing capital of the world, Indianapolis, with Stadium Championship Series Blue. Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga continues to ride a wave of momentum as he tries to win his 6th Overall Event Championship of the season while Colt Stephens looks to climb up the series points leaderboard by earning his second consecutive Freestyle win.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East rides into the racing capital of the world. The newly formed Monster Jam rivalry heats up between Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga and JCB Diagtron’s Tristan England as they battle for the series points lead. Meanwhile, Tom Meents looks to lead Max D to victory in one of the wildest freestyle competitions of the season.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2010 season races into Ford Field, on January 16, 2010.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: At the Capital One Arena on January 25, 2020, Monster Jam's 2020 season continues!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: The Dome at America's Center - St. Louis, MO
programme.desc: Day two of Monster Jam's 2021 season stop in St. Louis, MO continues with more trucks and more fun!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Check out Monster Jam's March 30, 2019 Stadium Championship Series 3 event at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome in New Orleans, Louisiana. Featuring Charlie Pauken and Grave Digger, Cory Rummell and Megalodon Fire, Mike Vaters and Black Stallion, Jamey Garner and Over Bored, Todd LeDuc and Monster Energy, Jim Koehler and Monster Mutt, and so many more!

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Arena Championship Series East heads to MVP Arena in Albany, New York as Weston Anderson looks to keep the series points lead with Grave Digger. Will he take the overall event championship or will Jurassic Attack’s Dalton Widner or Scooby-Doo’s Linsey Read rise to the occasion.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals 1 - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Part 2
programme.desc: A continuation of the first Monster Jam World Finals sees even more exciting racing and freestyle action!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: The 2017 season of Monster Jam races into the Carrier Dome with more racing and freestyle action from all your favorite drivers and trucks!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam blasts into the Silverdome with freestyle! It's the most extreme monster jam action you'll see anywhere!

programme.desc: Buckle in for all the Monster Jam racing action from Orlando Citrus Bowl, on January 28, 2012.

programme.sub-title: World Finals XIV - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Racing
programme.desc: All the racing action from Monster Jam World Finals XIV on March 23, 2013.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East rolls into upstate New York as Tyler Menninga attempts to clinch his second straight series title, while JCB Digatron’s Tristan England and Megalodon’s Todd LeDuc attempt to block Grave Digger from the series win.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam goes to Holland for a series of competitions from the Gelredome, on September 29, 2012.

programme.desc: Check out the non-stop freestyle action from Ford Field on March 6, 2014.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: Trans World Dome - St. Louis, MO - Freestyle
programme.desc: It's time for freestyle carnage! This week, St. Louis is in for one wild ride from the Trans World Dome during the 2001 season of Monster Jam!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: Levi's Stadium - Santa Clara, CA - Racing
programme.desc: Don't miss the Monster Jam racing action and excitement at Levi's Stadium on April 11, 2015.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East continues its tear through the sunshine state as Tyler Menninga attempts to drive Grave Digger to back-to-back event championships. Meanwhile, Tristan England is undefeated on the Ray-J racetrack and looks to pilot JCB Digatron to a perfect racing record as Monster Jam continues in Tampa.
